ViewPoint is a native JavaScript library for parsing and evaluating mathematical expressions. It supports various data types, including numbers, BigInt, strings, and booleans, and includes robust data-type checking to prevent errors during evaluation. The library also offers features like expression tokenization, infix to postfix conversion, and support for JavaScript and external variables.
